sentences.en: Any exercise that causes undue shortness of breath should be stopped.
sentences.cn: 任何导致呼吸出现困难的锻炼都应停止。

sentences.en: Both animals and people were gasping for breath in the rarefied air.
sentences.cn: 动物和人在稀薄的空气中都大口喘着气。

sentences.en: Cal took a long, deep breath, struggling to control his own emotions.
sentences.cn: 卡尔深长地吸了一口气，努力控制自己的情绪。

sentences.en: he swore violently under his breath.
sentences.cn: 他压低嗓门恶骂。

sentences.en: He was aware of the stink of stale beer on his breath.
sentences.cn: 他知道自己嘴里有股变味啤酒的馊味。

sentences.en: His breath was hanging in the air before him.
sentences.cn: 他的哈气悬浮在自己面前。

sentences.en: His chest heaved, and he took a deep breath.
sentences.cn: 他的胸脯上下起伏，然后他深深地吸了口气。

sentences.en: Hold your breath for a count of five, then slowly breathe out.
sentences.cn: 屏住气息数五下，然后慢慢地呼气。

sentences.en: I held my breath and sank under the water.
sentences.cn: 我屏住呼吸沉入水底。

sentences.en: I took a deep breath of the fresh sea air.
sentences.cn: 我深吸了一口海边的新鲜空气。

sentences.en: I've far better things to do than waste my breath arguing.
sentences.cn: 我不会徒费唇舌辩论的，我还有更有意义的事情要做呢。

sentences.en: Kenny caught his breath as Nikko nearly dropped the bottle.
sentences.cn: 尼科差点儿把瓶子摔了，这让肯尼倒吸了一口气。

sentences.en: Meer let out his breath in a long sigh.
sentences.cn: 米尔长叹了一口气。

sentences.en: Next thing you know I'll be knitting baby clothes. But don't hold your breath!.
sentences.cn: 还要告诉你一件事，我要编织娃娃穿的衣服了。不过不要抱太高期望。

sentences.en: politics has been the breath of life to her for 50 years.
sentences.cn: 这五十年以来，政治一直是她的生命。

sentences.en: Scarcely a breath of air disturbed the stillness of the day.
sentences.cn: 几乎没有一丝微风搅扰白日的宁静。

sentences.en: she admitted it but said in the same breath that it was of no consequence.
sentences.cn: 她承认了这件事同时却又说这并不重要。

sentences.en: she would fight to the last breath to preserve her good name.
sentences.cn: 为保护自己的清誉，她将斗争到底。

sentences.en: Slow down, I need to catch my breath.
sentences.cn: 慢一点，我要喘口气。

sentences.en: The tone of her voice told him he was wasting his breath.
sentences.cn: 她的语气使他明白他是在白费口舌。

sentences.en: The whole world holds its breath for this speech.
sentences.cn: 整个世界都屏住呼吸等待这一讲话。

sentences.en: There she was, slightly out of breath from running.
sentences.cn: 她在那儿，跑得有点儿喘不过气来。

sentences.en: We listened with bated breath to Grandma's stories of her travels.
sentences.cn: 我们屏住呼吸听祖母讲述她的游历故事。

words.tran_cn: 喘不过气来的；停止呼吸的
呼吸者；呼吸的东西；剧烈的运动；短时间的休息
呼吸（breath的过去式和过去分词）
呼吸；低语；松口气；（风）轻拂
呼吸；使喘息；流露；低声说

phrases.tran_cn: 少量的新鲜空气，短暂的时间内呼吸到的新鲜空气

phrases.phrase: before one can (或 has time to) draw breath

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（用于表示某事不会发生）别憋着呼吸，别期望太高
呼吸十分困难， 上气不接下气
喘过气来，恢复正常呼吸
一口气；同时（等于in the same breath）
喘不过气来，上气不接下气
别唠叨了；省口气吧；别白费口舌了
喘口气；深深地吸一口气
使大吃一惊；让我无法呼吸
使某人激动（或惊羡）得透不过气来
使大吃一惊；使人高兴得说不出话来；令人屏息
生命中不可缺少的东西
(因恐惧、焦虑而)屏息地，不出声地[见 breath]

trans.tran_cn: 呼吸的空气，一口气，微量，迹象
trans.tran_en: to start breathing normally again after running or making a lot of effort
to start breathing normally again after running or making a lot of effort
